author: Terrible_Cut_3336
text: Sad shut in finally realises grass exists.

author: memorablehandle
text: Dude was doing something he enjoyed that helped the community once a week. Only sad thing here is what this comment says about you.

author: Terrible_Cut_3336
text: You need to really go read some information on how sarcasm works.

author: Drigr
text: And you need to go read "How To Be Funny for Dummies"

author: Terrible_Cut_3336
text: And yet you are the one having a shit fit over a small collection of words on the internet. Clearly you forgot how The Internet™ works and has always worked.

author: sodanakin
text: The internet pointed out you suck.

author: Terrible_Cut_3336
text:
6 small brained limp dicks hardly constitutes "The Internet™".

How about you make like what you should do with your comment and delete yourself from the global server. I guarantee you not even your mum, with her big black bull of a boyfriend she cucks your dad with, will not miss you.

author: Terrible_Cut_3336
text:
I am actually. I am thriving in the real world. Because I don't suffer morons in real life. Unlike being forced to on shit pits like Reddit.

You are fortunate in your slobbering idiocy, that you are oblivious to having to listen to low IQ mouth breathing Neanderthals. Those who've never known the touch of a woman outside their mum, or the warmth of the sun on their face; nor the touch of grass beneath their feet.

Maybe not suffering double digit IQ twat waffles is precisely why I am thriving and you, well, look at you, and your little group of 7 simpering cretins that seem to think -7 internet points means anything other than fuck all.

author: sodanakin
text: I wasn't referring to the upvotes or downvotes. I think you speaking speaks for itself.

author: memorablehandle
text: Go read some information on this ratio

author: Terrible_Cut_3336
text: If you think that is a ratio... I got news for ya'... you ain't seen shit.

author: Terrible_Cut_3336
text: At least 11 people didn't get it.
